questions.text: What is the name of the ninja village Naruto and his friends are from?
options: The Village Hidden in the Mist
The Village Hidden in the Leaves
The Village Hidden in the Sand
The Village Hidden in the Clouds
questions.answer: The Village Hidden in the Leaves

questions.text: Who is the sensei of Team 7?
What is Naruto's favorite food?
What is the name of the nine-tailed beast sealed inside Naruto?
Which character is known as the 'Copy Ninja'?
What is the name of the main antagonist in the first part of the series?
Which character uses the 'Chidori' technique?
Who is the Fifth Hokage?
What is the name of the group of rogue ninjas who hunt tailed beasts?
Which of Naruto's rivals is from the Sand Village?
What type of jutsu is the 'Rasengan'?
Who is the younger brother of Itachi Uchiha?
What is the name of the summoning animal of Jiraiya?
Who founded the Village Hidden in the Leaves?
What is Sakura's signature fighting style?
What is the name of the team consisting of Naruto, Sasuke, and Sakura?
Who is the Fourth Hokage?
Which character can use the 'Byakugan'?
What is the main goal of the Akatsuki?
options: Bringing peace to the ninja world

questions.text: Who is known for saying 'Believe it!'?

quizzes.title: Naruto Guess the Char from the Eye

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Itachi's Mangekyo Sharingan.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of the Rinnegan.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Hinata's Byakugan.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Naruto's Sage Mode eyes.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Kakashi's Sharingan.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Sasuke's Rinne-Sharingan.

questions.note: Image should be of Danzo's Sharingan-covered arm.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Sarada's Sharingan.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Konan's Rinnegan (implied through her connection to Pain).

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Orochimaru's snake-like eyes.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Shisui's Mangekyo Sharingan.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Boruto's Jougan.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Kaguya's Byakugan and Rinne-Sharingan.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Rock Lee's normal, wide eyes.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Shikamaru's tired-looking eyes.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Kabuto's Sage Mode eyes.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Nagato's Rinnegan.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Karin's red eyes.

questions.text: Based on the eye in the image, who is this character?
questions.note: Image should be of Kurama's eyes.

questions.text: This character is a master of genjutsu and has a unique fighting style using crows. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Itachi.

questions.text: This character is a powerful medical ninja and one of the legendary Sannin. Who are they?
questions.note: Add an image of Tsunade.

questions.text: This character is known for their impressive taijutsu skills and for being a master of the Eight Inner Gates. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Might Guy.

questions.text: This character has a strong connection to Naruto and is the jinchuriki of the one-tailed Shukaku. Who are they?
questions.note: Add an image of Gaara.

questions.text: Known for his super long scarf, this character is a member of the Akatsuki and is Pain's partner. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Konan.

questions.text: This character is known for their puppet mastery and for being a former member of the Akatsuki. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Sasori.

questions.text: This character is known as the 'Leaf's Noble Beast' and fights with explosive scrolls. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Tenten.

questions.text: This character is a member of the Uchiha clan and is famous for his fire-style techniques. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Sasuke.

questions.text: This character is a member of the Ino-Shika-Cho trio and is known for their shadow manipulation jutsu. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Shikamaru.

questions.text: This character is a user of explosive clay and is a member of the Akatsuki. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Deidara.

questions.text: This character has a dog named Akamaru and is a member of Team 8. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Kiba.

questions.text: This character is a spy for Orochimaru and a former member of the Anbu. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Kabuto.

questions.text: This character is the leader of the Akatsuki and has the Rinnegan. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Pain.

questions.text: This character can transform into water and is a member of Sasuke's team 'Taka'. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Suigetsu.

questions.text: This character is known for their superhuman strength and ability to heal others. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Sakura.

questions.text: This character is known as the 'Legendary Sannin' and is a great sage. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Jiraiya.

questions.text: This character is an Anbu captain and a master of the 'Lightning Blade' jutsu. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Kakashi.

questions.text: This character is a master of the 'Mind Transfer' jutsu and is a member of Team 10. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Ino.

questions.text: This character is a member of the Akatsuki and wields a giant sword called Samehada. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Kisame.

questions.text: This character is the main protagonist of the series and has the nine-tailed fox sealed inside him. Who is it?
questions.note: Add an image of Naruto.
